item.description:
We're holding an informal get-together at noon on Saturday, 8 December in Java Jo's cafe (3710 Washington St. in Jamaica Plain, near the Forest Hills station). This should be a relaxed and fun opportunity to meet up and chat, maybe get a drink or something to eat, so stop by and bring your friends.

There's no agenda, so we'll just chat about whatever comes to mind, but we are organizing events for the near future (including a forum on worker-member relations at co-operative stores and a fundraising party/concert) and we should check in on progress organizing them. We also have our presidential campaign well under way, and will give updates about recent developments and upcoming

All are welcome, nothing is required. For more information, check out any of
www.spboston.org
www.sp-usa.org
www.vote-socialist.org
www.VoteBrianMoore.com
item.name: Socialist Kaffeeklatsch
